content: Unfortunately, despite its size, you will need to be on foot during the fight. The key to defeating this enormous rocky monster is to head for its fits and attack the blue crystals you can on them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mantis-Catching Swamp' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai King - Giant Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Unfortunately, despite its size, you will need to be on foot during the fight. The key to defeating this enormous rocky monster is to head for its fits and attack the blue crystals you can on them.
